MWC.GUI.Properties.Swing

Class SwingPropertyEditor2

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Properties.PlainPropertyEditor
      • MWC.GUI.Properties.Swing.SwingPropertyEditor2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SwingPropertyEditor2
extends PlainPropertyEditor
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Swing implementation of a property editor. note that setRowHeight in initForm is jdk1.3 specific! ===============================
